profiles.name: Jenny Knudsen
profiles.description: Jenny is licenced to the chaplaincy as a Reader (also known as Licenced Lay Minister). She also co-leads the St Boniface Sunday School and is the chaplaincy's social media admin.

profiles.name: Annette Klever
profiles.description:
What has been done, has been done;
What has not been done, has not been done.
Let it be.
